Unsolved security issues are costly. Obtain independent, honest advice and expertise.

Find a consultant

About Organization

A unique community of independent professionals establishing and refining security consulting best practices.

IAPSC offers members the opportunity to collaborate with top security professionals to develop and grow successful practices. IAPSC certified members have demonstrated knowledge of the highest levels of professionalism, skill, and integrity.

150+

We have thousands of qualified consultants in our community

IAPSC - International Association of Professional Security Consultants

November 19, 2024

IAPSC - International Association of Professional Security Consultants

https://www.linkedin.com/company/iapsc/posts/?feedView=all

In last month's IAPSC & SIA webinar, industry experts provided an insider’s perspective on maximizing value with security consultants - whether for a technology upgrade or an enterprise-wide audit. Panelists drew from experience on thousands of projects, sharing practical insights on leveraging consulting partnerships to enhance security initiatives.
